input.sentences: it was a family fun day for all the families .
there were games and prizes for the kids .
they got to test their skills against each other .
there was even a band on hand that played songs for everyone .
output.sentences: My family had fun with the other families.
The kids played games for prizes.
My kids and their friends had fun.
We play fought each other to test our fighting skills.
